FuncDef: When theenable-origin-validationcommand is added to the configuration of a group or neighbor, it causes every inbound IPv4 and/or IPv6 route from that peer to be marked with one of the 3 following origin validation states:

ParaDef.Info: Enables origin validation processing for unlabeled unicast IPv4 routes.
Enables origin validation processing for unlabeled unicast IPv6 routes.
Enables origin validation processing for labeled IPv4 routes.
Enables origin validation processing for labeled IPv6 routes.
